metadata.description: Satoru Nakamura is a voice actor with over 20 years of experience. For him, love means fooling around. The night he invites Yukihiro Naruse, a fellow voice actor over 10 years his junior, to his home is supposed to be the usual one-time thing. However, instead of responding to Nakamura's move on him, Naruse ends up doing the fucking! And on top of somehow ending up with his virginity stolen, Nakamura finds out the other man really has a thing for him. And the man's youth seems to cause him to be blindly in love with the older Nakamura. In the end, Nakamura decides to just play around with the other man until he gets tired of his older plaything and then something happens to change all that.
metadata.name: HIS SWEET RESTRAINT (Yaoi Manga)
